txt.en: Woodsmen are the foremost bowyers in Middle-earth, and are capable of crafting fine weapons from wood, as well as gathering and treating the raw wood they need.  Their knowledge of plants and nature also makes them natural Farmers.  Woodsman is an excellent choice for anyone who wants to create their own mighty bows.  Do you wish to learn this trade?  (WOODWORKER, FORESTER, FARMER)
A Woodsman is trained to survive off the land, and make weapons from natural materials.

Woodsmen are the foremost bowyers in Middle-earth, and are capable of crafting fine weapons from wood, as well as gathering and treating the raw wood they need.  Their knowledge of plants and nature also makes them natural Farmers.  Woodsman is an excellent choice for anyone who wants to create their own mighty bows.  Do you wish to learn this trade?  (WOODWORKER, FORESTER, FARMER)
